_comment_last_generated_date: Records the most recent date a PNG snapshot was generated to avoid duplicates.
_comment_last_generated_observer: Records which observer produced the last PNG snapshot for auditability.
_comment_area51: Baseline memory for Area 51 reachability to detect rare shifts after stability.
_comment_area51_flight_baseline: Rolling baseline storage for Area 51 aggregated flight activity deviations.

area51._comment_last_state: Stores the last reachability state for stability comparisons.
area51._comment_last_change_date: Stores the date of the last reachability change to compute stability.

_comment_cuba_internet: Baseline memory for Cuba classification to measure extended offline periods.

cuba_internet._comment_outage_start_date: Stores the start date of an offline stretch to measure duration.
cuba_internet._comment_last_classification: Stores the most recent classification for continuity checks.

_comment_tls_fingerprints: Baseline memory for TLS fingerprints to detect rare long-term changes.

tls_fingerprints._comment_hosts: Stores per-host fingerprints with first-seen dates for change detection.

_comment_ipv6_states: Baseline memory for IPv6 availability to detect first-time or rare changes.

ipv6_states._comment_countries: Stores per-country IPv6 availability with stability timestamps.

_comment_global_reachability: Baseline memory for global reachability to detect new record lows.

global_reachability._comment_lowest_score: Stores the lowest observed score for historical comparison.
global_reachability._comment_date: Stores the date when the lowest score was observed.
